you can delete your Account at any time by going to the 'Settings' page when you are logged in and clicking on the 'Delete account' link.
Your Account will be deleted immediately but it may take a little while for Your Content (defined below) to be completely removed from the App.
4450.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time

tosdr.case: You have the right to leave this service at any time
tosdr.tldr: You'll have great fun on Bumble, but if you feel the need to leave, you can delete your Account at any time by going to the 'Settings' page when you are logged in and clicking on the 'Delete account' link. Your Account will be deleted immediately but it may take a little while for Your Content to be completely removed from the App.

4451.quoteText: We reserve the right at our sole discretion to terminate or suspend any Account
4451.title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason

tosdr.case: Your account can be deleted without prior notice and without a reason
tosdr.tldr: Bumble Trading Inc reserve the right at our sole discretion to terminate or suspend any Account, or make use of any operational, technological, legal or other means available to enforce the Terms (including without limitation blocking specific IP addresses), at any time without liability and without the need to give you prior notice.

13179.quoteText: Right to data portability: you can request a copy of your data in a machine-readable form that can be transferred to another provider.
13179.title: This service allows you to retrieve an archive of your data

tosdr.case: You can retrieve an archive of your data
